name: Free Online TOML JSON Converter Tool - ATools
description: Free online TOML ↔ JSON converter tool: Supports TOML to JSON, JSON to TOML, copy output, pure frontend local operation.
seoDescription: Free online TOML JSON converter tool that supports TOML to JSON (with optional pretty formatting) and JSON to TOML conversion, with one-click copy of conversion results. Pure frontend local operation without content uploads, suitable for configuration file conversion, toolchain integration, and development debugging.

ui.description: Description: This tool uses `@iarna/toml` for TOML parsing/serialization, runs purely frontend local without uploading content.
